players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I am very suspicious of Diana since Charlie was found dead last night and no one has given a solid lead yet. Diana has been quiet so far."
Diana: "Alice, that's a baseless accusation. Charlie died on Night 1 - we ALL had equal opportunity to be the killer. Why are you deflecting so hard onto me specifically?"
Bob: "I have investigated Diana last night and I can confirm she is the mafioso. We need to act on this information quickly to protect the town."
Bob: "I have confirmed Diana is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
Diana: "Bob, that's an interesting claim. If you're really the detective, why reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target? This feels like a desperate mafia play to get an easy mislynch."
You: "I believe Bob's claim of being the detective is genuine. It makes sense to trust his investigation and vote to arrest Diana now before more harm is done."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
